NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Risk Management and Expenses or the cell corresponding to Tax and Market Share?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Tax} and {Market Share} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Investments and Equity or the cell corresponding to Tax and Market Share?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Auditing and Assets or the cell corresponding to Tax and Profit?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Risk Management and Market Share or the cell corresponding to Banking and Valuation?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Risk Management} and {Market Share} has a higher heat value.
